title: SoftBank's Arm plans to set up chip training facility in South Korea

title: US health department unveils strategy to expand its adoption of AI technology
description: The U.S. Department of Health and Human Services on Thursday outlined a strategy to expand its use of artificial intelligence, building on the Trump administration's enthusiastic embrace of the rapidly advancing technology while raising questions about how health information would be protected.
